results.title: Metformin Induces Apoptosis and Inhibits Proliferation through the AMP-Activated Protein Kinase and Insulin-like Growth Factor 1 Receptor Pathways in the Bile Duct Cancer Cells
results.text_hl: ...Results: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ suppressed cell proliferation in @<m>DISEASE_Bile_Duct_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001650 @@@bile duct cancer@@@ cells by inducing apoptosis.
